example.text: During #NationalPoliceWeek, House Republicans are once again exploiting law enforcement for political gain, rather than helping our law enforcement agencies and officers with substantive policy. [[url]]

I call on my colleagues to reject the empty rhetoric and instead work with [[user]] to provide the resources necessary to actually support our law enforcement officers and their mission to protect and to serve our families and our communities.
That is why I was relentless in advocating for community projects in #VenturaCounty and the Conejo Valley to be included in the final government funding package signed into law by President Biden.
The time to prevent these tragedies has long passed, and the inaction of the Republican Caucus is not only unjustifiable but disgraceful and morally wrong.

It is with the deep understanding that we are a nation of laws and a nation of immigrants that [[user]] are working to pass comprehensive immigration reform that will protect American communities, the American people, and the American Dream. [[url]]
A full summary of the NDAA can be found here. ### Issues: 117th Congress, Defense

It is with the deep understanding that we are a nation of laws and a nation of immigrants that [[user]] are working to pass comprehensive immigration reform that will protect American communities, the American people, and the American Dream. [[url]]
